meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'dope', meaning excellent or outstanding.
meanings.sent1: She is the dopest artist in our school.
meanings.sent2: That movie was the dopest I've ever seen.
meanings.sent3: His dance moves are so dopest that everyone wants to learn from him.
meanings.sent4: The dopest sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The dopest cake at the party was decorated with edible glitter.

meanings.definition: Comparative form of 'dope', meaning more excellent or outstanding.
meanings.sent1: Out of all the desserts, the chocolate cake is the dopest.
meanings.sent2: This new phone is dopest than the one I had before.
meanings.sent3: The dopest thing about the park is the giant slide that goes super fast.
meanings.sent4: Her dopest idea was to create a community garden for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: The dopest view from the mountain peak took her breath away.
